description:
It`s the last episode, and Hijiri and Arata have their final showdown. Lugh joins in the fight, along with the Trinity Seven--Lilith, Levi, Arin, Mira, Akio, Yui, and Liese. Why is she attacking Arata? And what secret does Arata hold?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 聖戦少女[クリミナルガール]と魔王世界[ヒズワールド]
